HEADER.Name: BTUC25: Drilldowns
HEADER.PageHeaderScripts: <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.7.1/jquery.min.js"></script>|13||10|<link href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.3/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" rel="stylesheet"|13||10| integrity="sha384-QWTKZyjpPEjISv5WaRU9OFeRpok6YctnYmDr5pNlyT2bRjXh0JMhjY6hW+ALEwIH" crossorigin="anonymous">|13||10|<!-- Override the atrocious label and data CSS -->|13||10|<style type="text/css">|13||10| [class*="209386"] {|13||10| all: unset;|13||10| all: initial;|13||10| }|13||10| [class*="209388"] {|13||10| all: unset;|13||10| all: initial;|13||10| }|13||10| [class*="209389"] {|13||10| all: unset;|13||10| all: initial;|13||10| }|13||10|</style>
HEADER.PageFooterScripts: <script>|13||10| $(document).ready(function () {|13||10| loadJsonFromDTCol("209385", 1)|13||10| .then(function (data) {|13||10| sessionStorage.setItem("TopSales", JSON.stringify(data));|13||10| })|13||10| .catch(function (error) {|13||10| console.error(error.message);|13||10| });|13||10| });|13||10||13||10| /* ----------------------------|13||10| Description: Passed a data table ID and a (1-based) column index, returns a promise|13||10| that resolves to a JSON object for the column. Allows dashboards to utilize queries|13||10| that return JSON objects in multiple columns.|13||10| ---------------------------- */|13||10| function loadJsonFromDTCol(DataTableID, colIndex) {|13||10| return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {|13||10| // Use jQuery to select the table cell at the specified index|13||10| const col = $(".Table" + DataTableID + " td:nth-child(" + colIndex + ")");|13||10| // Check if the table element exists and has content|13||10| if (col) {|13||10| if (col.length > 0) {|13||10| // The replace regex was in the original, but probably not needed here?|13||10| const colData = col[0].innerHTML|13||10| .replace(/(?:\r\n|\r|\n)/g, "")|13||10| .replace(/\t/g, "")|13||10| .replaceAll(/[ ]{2,}/g, " ");|13||10| if (colData.length > 0) {|13||10| try {|13||10| resolve(JSON.parse(colData));|13||10| } catch (error) {|13||10| reject(|13||10| new Error(|13||10| `Failed to parse JSON from column data: ${error.message}`|13||10| )|13||10| );|13||10| }|13||10| } else {|13||10| reject(|13||10| new Error(|13||10| `Column data for Table${DataTableID}, index ${colIndex} is empty`|13||10| )|13||10| );|13||10| }|13||10| } else {|13||10| reject(|13||10| new Error(|13||10| `Unable to locate DOM element Table${DataTableID}; check ID`|13||10| )|13||10| );|13||10| }|13||10| }|13||10| });|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| function clickCounterL() {|13||10| const x = document.getElementById("result");|13||10| if (typeof (Storage) !== "undefined") {|13||10| if (localStorage.clickcount) {|13||10| localStorage.clickcount = Number(localStorage.clickcount) + 1;|13||10| } else {|13||10| localStorage.clickcount = 1;|13||10| }|13||10| x.innerHTML = "You have clicked the Local Storage button " + localStorage.clickcount + " time(s)!";|13||10| } else {|13||10| x.innerHTML = "Sorry, no Web storage support!";|13||10| }|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| function clickCounterS() {|13||10| const x = document.getElementById("result");|13||10| if (typeof (Storage) !== "undefined") {|13||10| if (sessionStorage.clickcount) {|13||10| sessionStorage.clickcount = Number(sessionStorage.clickcount) + 1;|13||10| } else {|13||10| sessionStorage.clickcount = 1;|13||10| }|13||10| x.innerHTML = "You have clicked the Session storage button " + sessionStorage.clickcount + " time(s) in this session!";|13||10| } else {|13||10| x.innerHTML = "Sorry, no Web storage support!";|13||10| }|13||10| }|13||10| </script>
HEADER.ExtraStyle: body {|13||10| background-color: #f8f9fa;|13||10| /* A common light gray */|13||10| padding: 30px;|13||10| /* Add some padding around the main container */|13||10| margin: 0;|13||10| font-family: Arial, sans-serif;|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .main-column-90 {|13||10| /* 90% Width and Centering */|13||10| width: 90%;|13||10| margin-left: auto;|13||10| margin-right: auto;|13||10||13||10| /* White Interior and Padding */|13||10| background-color: white;|13||10| padding: 20px;|13||10||13||10| /* Slight Shadow (Equivalent to Bootstrap's .shadow-sm) */|13||10| box-shadow: 0 0.125rem 0.25rem rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.075);|13||10||13||10| /* Rounded Corners */|13||10| border-radius: 0.25rem;|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .stacking-row {|13||10| width: 100%;|13||10| /* Ensure it takes full width of the parent */|13||10| margin-bottom: 15px;|13||10| /* Space between the rows (equivalent to mb-3) */|13||10| box-sizing: border-box;|13||10| /* Include padding and border in element's total width/height */|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .inner-row-content {|13||10| padding: 1rem;|13||10| border: 1px solid #dee2e6;|13||10| background-color: #e9ecef;|13||10| /* Very light gray for contrast */|13||10| border-radius: 0.25rem;|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .inner-row-content h5,|13||10| .inner-row-content p {|13||10| margin-top: 0;|13||10| margin-bottom: 0.5rem;|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .inner-row-content p:last-child {|13||10| margin-bottom: 0;|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| .button-primary {|13||10| padding: 8px 16px;|13||10| background-color: #007bff;|13||10| color: white;|13||10| border: none;|13||10| border-radius: 0.25rem;|13||10| cursor: pointer;|13||10| text-decoration: none;|13||10| display: inline-block;|13||10| margin: 15px;|13||10| }

COMPONENT_1.ExtraHTML: Drilldowns are broken for datatables (DT) that return JSON data. This DT has a defined drilldown to open a SmartView (SV) in a window. Clicking column data directly opens a blank SV (e.g., it's broken).
COMPONENT_1.Name: Header

HEADER.SQLStatement: DECLARE @dd1 INT = %drilldownID1%, @dd2 INT = %drilldownID2%, @dd3 VARCHAR(255) = %drilldowncaption%, @dd4 VARCHAR(255) = %drilldownString%|13||10||13||10|SELECT |13||10| @dd1 = ISNULL(@dd1 , -1)|13||10| , @dd2 = ISNULL(@dd2, -2)|13||10| , @dd3 = ISNULL(@dd3, '')|13||10| , @dd4 = ISNULL(@dd4, '')|13||10||13||10|SELECT |13||10| @dd1 AS [DrillDownID1]|13||10|, @dd2 AS [DrilldownID2]|13||10|, @dd3 AS [Drilldowncaption]|13||10|, @dd4 AS [DrilldownTestString]
HEADER.Name: TEST
HEADER.Notes: Some notes here New line New line 2

COMPONENT_3.ExtraHTML: JSON data can be passed to Drilldown recipients, but there are limitations and/or workarounds required. See the examples below to understand how Drilldowns work within the Dynamic Dashboard environment.
COMPONENT_3.Name: LDHeader

COMPONENT_4.Name: Links-LD
COMPONENT_4.SQL1: DECLARE @links TABLE (|13||10| LinkID INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY,|13||10| Text NVARCHAR(255),|13||10| LinkText NVARCHAR(75),|13||10| LinkURL NVARCHAR(255)|13||10|);|13||10||13||10|INSERT @links|13||10| (Text, LinkText, LinkURL)|13||10|VALUES|13||10| ('This example opens the (hardcoded) drilldown defined in the hidden OpenTestSV Text Line component', 'Static Drilldown', 'dislinkDrillDown209374'),|13||10| ('The "Text Line Custom" button opens the drilldown defined in a hidden Text Line component, but sends custom values encoded in the link: ', 'Text Line Custom', 'dislinkDrillDown209369%C3%82%C2%A0%drilldownID1%=2025%C3%82%C2%A0%drilldownID2%=1999%C3%82%C2%A0%drilldowncaption%=''Custom%20value%20here''%C3%82%C2%A0'),|13||10| ('The "Custom Param" button opens the drilldown defined in a hidden Text Line component, but sends a drilldown parameter that is not defined (or even available) in the Text Line component', 'Custom Param', 'dislinkDrillDown209369%C3%82%C2%A0%drilldownString=''bob''%C3%82%C2%A0'),|13||10| ('The "Custom Link" button opens the drilldown defined in the DataTable component, but sends custom values encoded in the link', 'Custom Link', 'dislinkDrillDown209369%C3%82%C2%A0%drilldownID1%=2025%C3%82%C2%A0%drilldownID2%=1999%C3%82%C2%A0%drilldowncaption%=''Custom%20value%20here''%C3%82%C2%A0'),|13||10| ('This example opens a Crystal report as defined in the ReportExample Text Line component. Note: The report does not import/export as a linked item (e.g., won''t work out of the box) and must be manually assigned to the Text Line component as a drilldown', 'Report Example', 'dislinkDrillDown209376'),|13||10| ('The "JSON value" button sends URLEncoded JSON value to the drilldown defined in the DataTable component', 'JSON Value', 'dislinkDrillDown209369%C3%82%C2%A0%drilldowncaption%=''%7B%22error%22%3A%20%22Doh%22%7D''%C3%82%C2%A0'),|13||10| ('This example saves JSON from a hidden datatable to session storage. The link passes the storage key to the Drilldowns 2 dashboard which contains logic to use the session storage data if available, otherwise the default SQL is run.', 'Session JSON', 'dislinkDrillDown209383%C3%82%C2%A0%drilldownStorageKey%=TopSales%C3%82%C2%A0'),|13||10| ('Click this button to increment a Session Storage counter', 'Session Counter', 'javascript:clickCounterS()'),|13||10| ('Click this button to increment a Local Storage counter', 'Local Counter', 'javascript:clickCounterL()');|13||10|/*|13||10| Create an HTML table with Bootstrap classes and links from the @links table. Requires a separate CSS override to style the table properly.|13||10|*/|13||10|SELECT 'table table-bordered table-striped table-hover caption-end' AS "@class",|13||10| (SELECT 'This table was created using SQL inside a Data Label component'|13||10| FOR XML PATH('caption'), TYPE), -- caption|13||10| (SELECT|13||10| (SELECT|13||10| 'table-primary' AS "th/@class"|13||10| , 'Description' AS th|13||10| , ''|13||10| , 'table-primary' AS "th/@class"|13||10| , 'Link' AS th|13||10| , ''|13||10| FOR XML PATH('tr'), TYPE) AS thead, -- header row|13||10| (SELECT|13||10| (SELECT -- Col 1|13||10| 'col1' AS "td/@class"|13||10| , 'cursor: pointer;' AS "td/@style"|13||10| -- Make entire row clickable by adding onclick to td; replace single quotes with URL encoded %27|13||10| , 'javascript:document.location.href=''' + REPLACE(l.LinkURL, '''', '%27') + '''' AS "td/@onclick"|13||10| , l.Text AS td|13||10| , ''|13||10| , ( -- Col 2: Nest with anchor link|13||10| SELECT|13||10| l.LinkURL AS "a/@href"|13||10| , 'btn btn-primary' AS "a/@class"|13||10| , l.LinkText AS a|13||10| FOR XML PATH('td'), TYPE|13||10| )|13||10| FROM @links l|13||10| FOR XML PATH('tr'), TYPE)|13||10| FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE) AS tbody|13||10| FOR XML PATH(''), TYPE)|13||10|FOR XML PATH('table');

COMPONENT_6.Caption: Hidden: Opens TEST SV in new window with hardcoded drilldown
COMPONENT_6.Name: OpenTestSV

HEADER.SQLStatement: DECLARE @dd1 INT = %drilldownID1%, @dd2 INT = %drilldownID2%, @dd3 VARCHAR(255) = %drilldowncaption%, @dd4 VARCHAR(255) = %drilldownString%|13||10||13||10|SELECT |13||10| @dd1 = ISNULL(@dd1 , -1)|13||10| , @dd2 = ISNULL(@dd2, -2)|13||10| , @dd3 = ISNULL(@dd3, '')|13||10| , @dd4 = ISNULL(@dd4, '')|13||10||13||10|SELECT |13||10| @dd1 AS [DrillDownID1]|13||10|, @dd2 AS [DrilldownID2]|13||10|, @dd3 AS [Drilldowncaption]|13||10|, @dd4 AS [DrilldownTestString]
HEADER.Name: TEST
HEADER.Notes: Some notes here New line New line 2

HEADER.SQLStatement: DECLARE @dd1 INT = %drilldownID1%, @dd2 INT = %drilldownID2%, @dd3 VARCHAR(255) = %drilldowncaption%, @dd4 VARCHAR(255) = %drilldownString%|13||10||13||10|SELECT |13||10| @dd1 = ISNULL(@dd1 , -1)|13||10| , @dd2 = ISNULL(@dd2, -2)|13||10| , @dd3 = ISNULL(@dd3, '')|13||10| , @dd4 = ISNULL(@dd4, '')|13||10||13||10|SELECT |13||10| @dd1 AS [DrillDownID1]|13||10|, @dd2 AS [DrilldownID2]|13||10|, @dd3 AS [Drilldowncaption]|13||10|, @dd4 AS [DrilldownTestString]

HEADER.Name: BTUC25:Drilldowns 2
HEADER.PageFooterScripts: <script>|13||10| $(document).ready(function () {|13||10| const jData = getJsonFromStorage("TopSales");|13||10| if (jData) {|13||10| // Change the index to match the desired table|13||10| const DataTableID = "Table" + $('div[class^="Component"]')[0].id;|13||10| const TableObj = $("table." + DataTableID);|13||10| replaceTableData('table.' + DataTableID, jData);|13||10| $("table." + DataTableID + " tr td:nth-child(5)").css("background-color", "red");|13||10| let capt = TableObj.find("caption");|13||10| if (capt.length === 0) {|13||10| capt = $("<caption>Loaded from session storage</caption>").css("font-weight", "bold").prependTo(TableObj);|13||10| }|13||10| } else {|13||10| console.warn("No data found in sessionStorage for key 'TopSales'.");|13||10| }|13||10| });|13||10||13||10| function getJsonFromStorage(key) {|13||10| if (typeof (Storage) !== "undefined") {|13||10| // Web Storage is supported|13||10| const storedItem = sessionStorage.getItem(key);|13||10| if (storedItem) {|13||10| try {|13||10| return JSON.parse(storedItem);|13||10| } catch (e) {|13||10| console.error(`Error parsing JSON for key "${key}":`, e);|13||10| return null;|13||10| }|13||10| } else {|13||10| console.warn(`Key "${key}" not found in sessionStorage.`);|13||10| return null;|13||10| }|13||10| } else {|13||10| console.error("Web Storage is not supported in this browser.");|13||10| return null;|13||10| }|13||10| }|13||10||13||10| function replaceTableData(tableSelector, data) {|13||10| const $tbody = $(tableSelector).find('tbody');|13||10| $tbody.empty(); // Clear existing content|13||10||13||10| const columnOrder = ["CalendarYear", "CalendarMonth", "TotalSales", "SalesRepID", "DataShown"];|13||10||13||10| $.each(data, function (index, rowData) {|13||10| const rowClass = index % 2 === 0 ? 'evenColoured' : 'oddColoured';|13||10| let $tr = $('<tr>').addClass(rowClass);|13||10||13||10| columnOrder.forEach(key => {|13||10| $('<td>')|13||10| .text(rowData[key] !== undefined ? rowData[key] : '')|13||10| .css({|13||10| 'width': '-1',|13||10| 'text-align': 'left',|13||10| 'border': '1px dotted #808080'|13||10| })|13||10| .appendTo($tr);|13||10| });|13||10||13||10| $tbody.append($tr);|13||10| });|13||10| }|13||10|</script>|13||10|

COMPONENT_1.Name: Top100Sales
COMPONENT_1.SQL1: DECLARE @StorageKey VARCHAR(50)|13||10||13||10|SELECT @StorageKey = '%drilldownStorageKey%'|13||10|/* If no key is passed, grab data from the db */|13||10|IF @StorageKey LIKE '_drilldownStorageKey_'|13||10|BEGIN|13||10| SELECT TOP 100 |13||10| sa.CalendarYear|13||10| , sa.CalendarMonth|13||10| , sa.TotalSales|13||10| , sa.SalesRepID|13||10| , 'New' AS [DataShown]|13||10| FROM SalesAnalysis2 sa WITH(NOLOCK)|13||10| WHERE sa.BranchID = 1|13||10|ORDER BY sa.CalendarYear DESC, sa.CalendarMonth DESC|13||10|END|13||10|ELSE|13||10|/* If a key is passed, fill the table with empty values to be replaced */|13||10|BEGIN|13||10| SELECT NULL [CalendarYear], NULL [CalendarMonth], NULL [TotalSales], NULL [SalesRepID], @StorageKey AS [DataShown]|13||10|END

COMPONENT_10.Name: StorageTable
COMPONENT_10.SQL1: SELECT JSON_QUERY(t1.Top100Sales) [Top100Sales]|13||10|FROM (|13||10|SELECT TOP 100 |13||10| sa.CalendarYear|13||10| , sa.CalendarMonth|13||10| , sa.TotalSales|13||10| , sa.SalesRepID|13||10| , 'Old' AS [DataShown]|13||10|FROM SalesAnalysis2 sa WITH(NOLOCK)|13||10|WHERE sa.BranchID = 1|13||10|ORDER BY sa.CalendarYear ASC, sa.CalendarMonth ASC|13||10|FOR JSON PATH) t1(Top100Sales);
